OOC: I could probably help with Grimlock starting now.

::Lord Elder/Grimlock::

The Watcher leader and revived Dinobot head to the transports with Jotunn and take their places.

Elder: Let's not waste much time. Those Maximals are getting slaughtered.

Grimlock: Me Grimlock seen this before. Fight big! Autobot City...

Nic <warriorazure@...> wrote:                               OOC: I spoke with Kham on the phone yesterday. Could somebody help me
 with Grimlock? I'll take care of Remus and let Razorwing sleep until
 he gets back.
 
 BIC:
 
 Jotunn: Thank you. My lord Elder, Grimlock, if you'd follow me please...
 
 He ran to the ships where the troops where almost done with preparations.
 
 --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "khamkain" <khamkain@...> wrote:
 >
 > ooc: Still in school rushed so I won't be able to post a lot for about
 > two or three week so i'll let Nic take control of Remus, Razorwing and
 > Grimlock until everything cooled down a bit.
 > 
 > bic: Razorwing : Since the city is still in bad shape I can only let
 > you off with about 30 men and three airtransport loaded with autogun.
 > You're going to have two airfigther to cover you. That's pretty much
 > what I can do right now but keep in contact radioand I migth be able
 > to get you some reinforcement.
 > 
 > 
 > 
 > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@> wrote:
 > >
 > > ::Lord Elder::
 > > 
 > > Elder: I don't have that ability either. I hope Relay can spare a
 > transport.
 > > 
 > > Nic <warriorazure@> wrote:                               Deadfur:
 > Roger that, sir.
 > >  
 > >  Deadfur starts sending signals to Atlantis asking to send a situation
 > >  report and telling them that reinforcements are en route.
 > >  
 > >  Jotunn: There is just one problem, Elder: I can't fly.
 > >  
 > >  > ::Lord Elder::
 > >  > 
 > >  > Elder: Deadfur, try and hail Atlantis. I want to know how bad they
 > >  are hurt. We'll need to assemble a group to got help them. I'll go
 > >  with them. If you can get in contact with anyone at Atlantis, I want
 > >  to know the status of Rodimus Prime. He is the best hope against
 > >  Unicron's forces.
 > >  > 
 > >  > Elder redirects his attention.
 > >  > 
 > >  > Elder: Razorwing, how many can we afford to send to Atlantis? I'll
 > >  go with Jotunn and Grimlock.
 > >  
 > >  
 > >      
 > >                                
 > > 
 > >  __________________________________________________
 > > Do You Yahoo!?
 > > Tired of spam?  Yahoo! Mail has the best spam protection around 
 > > http://mail.yahoo.com
 > >
 >
